title: Calories in Fairlife Milk
meta_description: Learn calories in fairlife milk per cup serving, including protein, carbs, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for this ultra-filtered dairy.
assumptions: Fairlife 2% ultra-filtered milk, per 1 cup (240 ml) serving; plain, no added flavors.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by Fairlife product type (e.g., fat content, flavored), batch, and serving size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One cup of Fairlife 2% milk provides 120 kcal and 13 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one cup of Fairlife milk?
faqs.a: 120 kcal for Fairlife 2% ultra-filtered milk per 1 cup serving.

faqs.q: What's the protein in Fairlife milk?
faqs.a: 13 g protein per cup, higher than regular milk due to ultra-filtration.

faqs.q: Does Fairlife milk have less sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 6 g sugars per cup versus 12 g in regular 2% milk.
Around 75-80 kcal per cup, with 13 g protein and minimal fat.
No, but it's easier to digest; lactose-free versions are available separately.
